opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Murphy v. Reinhard, Commissioner, Virginia Department of Mental Health, Mental Retardation and Substance Abuse Services

opinion:
537 U.S. 1158

MURPHY
v.
REINHARD, COMMISSIONER, VIRGINIA DEPARTMENT OF MENTAL HEALTH, MENTAL RETARDATION AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE SERVICES.

No. 02M48.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 21, 2003.

1

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis without an affidavit of indigency executed by petitioner granted.
